TopicTitle: Space Shuttle System Used by HellBlazer

Articles.Content:
Hello!

 

So I installed the Space Shuttle System what Hellblazer uses.  I installed realplume, realplume STOCK, and Hotrockets.  But when I lanch the space shutttle, the SRB flame and the SS Main engine flame would not appear.  So I deleted the realplume, realplume STOCK, and hotrockets and my flames were back.  But the shuttle main engine had the ugly plumes and I do not like it.  Can someone help?
